relic_shard.name: A Shard of Truth
relic_shard.description: Find a Relic Shard in the Temple Ruins.
accept_lines: We need proof the ruins have re-opened.
Bring back a Relic Shard from the Temple Ruins and we'll pay you for the risk.
turn_in_lines: A Relic Shard... the markings are real.
Good work. This will help the Archivist decode the murals.

reach_floor_3.name: Deeper Echoes
reach_floor_3.description: Reach Floor 3 of the Temple Ruins.
accept_lines: The surface chambers are picked clean.
Go deeper—reach Floor 3—and report what you find.
turn_in_lines: So the tremors continue even at Floor 3...
Here. You'll need supplies if you're going back down.

bounty_raiders.name: Bounty: Ruins Raiders
bounty_raiders.description: Thin out raiders preying on explorers.
accept_lines: We have a bounty posted by local traders.
Defeat 3 Ruins Raiders in the Temple Ruins.
turn_in_lines: That's 3 raiders less to worry about.
Keep your eyes open. The ruins attract the wrong kind of people.

rescue_satchel.name: Rescue: Lost Satchel
rescue_satchel.description: Recover a satchel from a missing explorer.
accept_lines: A junior explorer went missing near the ruins.
If you find their satchel, bring it back. Their family is worried.
turn_in_lines: This is it... thank you.
We'll notify the family. You did what you could.

escort_scout.name: Escort: Guide the Scout
escort_scout.description: Guide a scout deeper into the Jungle Cavern.
accept_lines: A scout is mapping new passages outside of town.
Enter the Jungle Cavern and reach Floor 2.
turn_in_lines: Good. The scout's notes will help the next team.
Here's your pay. Keep moving forward.

bounty_guardians.name: Bounty: Stone Guardians
bounty_guardians.description: Clear dangerous guardians near deeper chambers.
accept_lines: The deeper chambers have awakened something heavy.
Defeat 2 Stone Guardians.
turn_in_lines: Two down. The path is safer for now.
You're getting noticed.

nephil_relic_ankh.name: The Grand Search: Sun Ankh
nephil_relic_ankh.description: A new civilization has surfaced in the sands. Recover a Nephil relic.
accept_lines: Welcome to the Guild, officially.
A lost civilization—the Nephil—has appeared where the desert used to be empty.
Find the Sun Ankh relic and bring it back before the Children of the Nephil do.
turn_in_lines: This is Nephil work... no doubt.
Two more relics are rumored to exist. Don't let them reach the Children of the Nephil.

nephil_relic_map.name: The Grand Search: Star Map
nephil_relic_map.description: Recover the Nephil Star Map from deeper ruins.
accept_lines: The next relic lies near an oasis ruin—if it still deserves that name.
Giants have been seen. Stay low. Stay smart.
Bring back the Star Map.
turn_in_lines: A map of the sky... and of something beneath it.
One relic remains—the king's crown. The tomb won't open for the unworthy.

nephil_king.name: The Grand Search: Mummified King
nephil_king.description: Enter the Nephil tomb, claim the crown, and defeat the last king.
accept_lines: This is the last piece. The Children of the Nephil want to resurrect the giants of old.
Enter the tomb, take the Crown of Dust, and end the king's reign.
turn_in_lines: You did it... the crown is sealed and the king is down.
The Children of the Nephil will respond. Keep moving. The timeline depends on it.

cave_in_rescue.name: Cave-in: Rescue Operation
cave_in_rescue.description: A remote mine has collapsed. Rescue trapped miners and escort them home.
accept_lines: We got a distress call from miners in a remote shaft.
The Children of the Nephil are there too—playing hero. Don't trust them.
Rescue 26 miners and escort them out. Then find the head miner in the deepest shaft.
turn_in_lines: They're alive... you actually pulled it off.
The public loves a good rescue story. Be careful who gets to tell it.

rival_hostage.name: Rivalry: Hostage Rescue
rival_hostage.description: Your rival went missing on a bragging spree. Rescue them from the Children of the Nephil.
accept_lines: Your rival hasn't checked in. Not like them.
A rumor says the Children of the Nephil took someone into a hideout.
Bring them back. Alive.
turn_in_lines: They're alive... barely.
The rivalry can wait. This was a warning.

babel_tablet.name: Not What They Seem (I): Babel Tablet
babel_tablet.description: Investigate the strange tower and recover evidence of mixed languages.
accept_lines: A new civilization has appeared around a giant tower.
The writings are an impossible mix of languages—like they were fused together.
Bring back a Babel Tablet so the Archivist can study it.
turn_in_lines: These scripts... they're stacked like layers in time.
This tower isn't just old. It's *wrong*. Keep going.

nimrods_bow_find.name: Not What They Seem (I): Nimrod's Bow
nimrods_bow_find.description: Reach the bottom of the tower and recover the artifact known as Nimrod's Bow.
accept_lines: Reports say the tower has a deep foundation—stairs that shouldn't exist.
At the bottom is an artifact: Nimrod's Bow.
Bring it back. Keep it close. Don't trust the new recruit.
turn_in_lines: You actually found it...
Hold on—someone's missing. Where is the recruit?

nimrods_bow_retrieve.name: Not What They Seem (II): Steal It Back
nimrods_bow_retrieve.description: The Children of the Nephil stole the bow. Infiltrate their vault and retrieve it.
accept_lines: The recruit was an imposter.
The bow is in a Children vault. If they use it, the timeline fractures.
Go. Retrieve Nimrod's Bow.
turn_in_lines: You got it back.
Now we do the hard part: we destroy it.

nimrods_bow_destroy.name: Not What They Seem (II): Destroy the Bow
nimrods_bow_destroy.description: Hand over Nimrod's Bow so the Guild can destroy it safely.
accept_lines: We can't keep it. Not even locked away.
Bring the bow to the Professor. We'll destroy it before the Children can trace it.
turn_in_lines: It's done. The bow is gone.
But the Children now know exactly who you are.

ice_bounty_wolves.name: Ice Expedition: Thin the Wolves
ice_bounty_wolves.description: Predators are circling the base camp. Cull the pack leaders.
accept_lines: Something is watching the tents at night.
Defeat 4 Ice Wolves along the Snowbound Path.
turn_in_lines: Good. Fewer eyes in the dark.
Stay warm. Stay moving.

ice_recon_ice_cave.name: Ice Expedition: Cave Recon
ice_recon_ice_cave.description: Map the ice cave tunnels and report what you find.
accept_lines: The ice cave winds like a throat.
Reach Floor 3 and come back with notes.
turn_in_lines: Tight passages, strange echoes... understood.
If the Children show up, do not engage alone.

ice_arrowhead_map.name: Chapter 7: Find the Arrowhead Map
ice_arrowhead_map.description: Push up Mt Arot and recover the map that points to the lost arrow tip.
accept_lines: The bow is gone—but a fragment remains somewhere in the ice.
Climb Mt Arot. Something ancient guards a map we need.
Bring back the Arrowhead Map before the Children can.
turn_in_lines: You found it...
This could change everything.

tropic_arrowhead.name: Chapter 8: Race for the Arrow Tip
tropic_arrowhead.description: Sail to a tropical island and recover the arrow tip from within a volcano.
accept_lines: The map points to a tropical island—with a volcano.
The Children will be there. They always are.
Retrieve the Arrow Tip Fragment and return immediately.
turn_in_lines: You have it.
Good. Now we follow them underground.

core_finale.name: Chapter 9: Final Descent
core_finale.description: Descend to the core and stop the Children before they trigger a second flood.
accept_lines: No retreat this time.
Descend to the deepest chamber and defeat the Child High Priest.
turn_in_lines: It's done...
For now.

post_bounty_warmaster.name: Postgame Bounty: Warmaster Remnants
post_bounty_warmaster.description: Leftover warbands are still active. Put them down before they regroup.
accept_lines: Rumors say a Warmaster's remnants still roam.
Defeat 2 Child Enforcers in the Core Descent.
turn_in_lines: Good.
History holds its breath a little easier.

post_bounty_ice.name: Postgame Bounty: Ice Stalkers
post_bounty_ice.description: Base Camp supply lines are being hit. Clear the trail again.
accept_lines: The snowbound trail is hostile again.
Defeat 5 Ice Wolves.
turn_in_lines: Supplies can move again.
Don't get complacent in the cold.

post_recon_volcano.name: Postgame Recon: Volcano Pass
post_recon_volcano.description: Re-enter the volcano and confirm the chamber remains sealed.
accept_lines: No one wants to go back in there.
Reach Floor 5 of the Tropic Island Volcano and return.
turn_in_lines: Still sealed. Good.
For now.
